datafield.subfield: General German School Committee of the United States
General School Committee of the Germans of the United States

Its Address of the General School Committee of the Germans of the United States, to the citizens of the U. States and Germany, published by resolution of the German Convention, held at Pittsburgh, Pa., October 18, 1837, 1837:
p. 4 (signed by authority of the General German School Committee of the United States)
(hdg.: General German School Committee of the United States)
